articles.description: PRINCE HARRY'S plan to cling on to his remaining military titles has been thrown up in the air by Buckingham Palace aides, who insisted the Queen could not allow him to drag out his 'half-in half-out' role in the Royal Family.

articles.author: Deirdre Simonds
articles.title: Maren Morris says female artists would be 'social pariahs' if they behaved like Morgan Wallen - Daily Mail
articles.description: Kelsea Ballerini called out Morgan Wallen after he was suspended from his record label for saying the N-word in a leaked video.
articles.content:
Maren Morris and Kelsea Ballerini called out Morgan Wallen after he was suspended from his record label for saying the N-word in a leaked video.
